configJson.description:
JSON file(s) with application configuration.
Parameters values from json file are overwritten by values provided at command line.
Type: vector<string>

configDumpJson.description:
Name of the JSON file used for configuration dump
Type: string

dataFile.description:
Comma separated list of input files.
Type: string

treeName.description:
Name of a TTree containing event data, read by EventSourceROOT. 
Type: string

readNEvents.description:
Number of events to read from input file; -1 means all events. 
Type: int

resourcesPath.description:
Global path to the resources directory.
Type: string

frameLoadRange.description:
Number of GRAW frames searched for ASAD fragments for given event. Only relevant when storing multiple ASAD boards per GRAW file. Keep it low in online GUI mode.
Type: int

singleAsadGrawFile.description:
Switch defining whether there is a single GRAW input file per ASAD board.
Type: bool

updateInterval.description:
GUI update interval in online mode. Units are [milliseconds].
Type: int

zLogScale.description:
Z axis mode for 2D charge display.
Type: bool

autoZoom.description:
Switch for automatic zoom in on charge deposit in 2D charge display.
Type: bool

recoMode.description:
Switch for enabling manual track reconstruction in GUI mode.
 Reconstructed tracks are saved into a file.
Type: bool

rate.description:
Switch for enabling in online GUI mode rate vs time plot instead of charge projected onto time axis plot.
Type: bool

develMode.description:
Switch for enabling developer set of histograms in GUI / makeTrackTree reconstruction mode.
Type: bool

technicalMode.description:
Switch for enabling detector-specific technical set of histograms in GUI mode.
Type: bool

remove.description:
Switch controlling pedestal removal.
Type: bool

minPedestalCell.description:
Pedestal time cell range - minimal value.
Type: int

maxPedestalCell.description:
Pedestal time cell range - maximal value.
Type: int

minSignalCell.description:
Signal time cell range - minimal value.
Type: int

maxSignalCell.description:
Signal time cell range - maximal value.
Type: int

recoClusterEnable.description:
Switch for enabling hit clustering in 2D charge maps in GUI / makeTrackTree reconstruction mode.
Type: bool

recoClusterThreshold.description:
Charge threshold above pedestal for reco 2D cluster seed hits.
Type: float

recoClusterConstantFractionThreshold.description:
Charge threshold above pedestal as fraction of maximal signal for reco 2D cluster seed hits.
Type: float

recoClusterDeltaStrips.description:
Strip range of hits added to cluster around seed hits passing threshold value.
Type: int

recoClusterDeltaTimeCells.description:
Time bin range of hits added to cluster around seed hits passing threshold value.
Type: int

enabled.description:
Flag enabling event filtering before reconstruction.
Type: bool

maxChargeUpperBound.description:
Upper peak charge threshold to accept an event [ADC units].
Type: float

maxChargeLowerBound.description:
Lower peak charge threshold to accept an event [ADC units].
Type: float

totalChargeLowerBound.description:
Lower threshold on total charge sum to accept an event [ADC units].
Type: float

totalChargeUpperBound.description:
Upper threshold on total charge sum to accept an event [ADC units].
Type: float

events.description:
List of event IDs to be accepted from the input file(s). Empty vector has no effect (default).
Type: vector<unsigned int>

pressure.description:
Gas pressure in chamber [mbar]=[hPa]. 
Type: float

temperature.description:
Gas temperature in chamber [K].
Type: float

comment.description:
Optional description of TPC working conditions, such as: E-field, HVs.
Type: string

energy.description:
LAB gamma beam energy [MeV].
Type: float

input.description:
Input ROOT file with TPCRecoData tree for recoEventsDiff analysis.
Type: string

reference.description:
Reference ROOT file with TPCRecoData tree for recoEventsDiff analysis.
Type: string

no-type.description:
Flag to skip comparing event type in TPCRecoData trees used for recoEventsDiff analysis.
Type: bool

no-segments.description:
Flag to skip comparing number of segments in TPCRecoData trees used for recoEventsDiff analysis.
Type: bool

no-presence.description:
Flag to skip printing extra- and missing events in TPCRecoData trees used for recoEventsDiff analysis.
Type: bool

no-info.description:
Flag to skip printing file- and tree info on every line in recoEventsDiff analysis.
Type: bool

noTree.description:
Flag to enable saving a TTree with some track properties. 
Type: bool

nominalBoost.description:
Flag to enable nominal beam energy when calculating boost to CM.
Type: bool

beamOffset.description:
Beam offset in X direction [mm].
Type: float

beamSlope.description:
Beam slope in X direction.
Type: float

beamDir.description:
Beam direction. Positive values means beam along +X, negative -X.
Type: int

alphaMinCut.description:
Minimal alpha track length. [mm]
Type: float

alphaMaxCut.description:
Maximal alpha track length. [mm]
Type: float

carbonMinCut.description:
Minimal carbon track length. [mm]
Type: float

carbonMaxCut.description:
Maximal carbon track length. [mm]
Type: float

alphaScaleCorr.description:
Multiplicative alpha track length correction.
Type: float

alphaOffsetCorr.description:
Additive alpha track length correction. [mm]
Type: float

carbonScaleCorr.description:
Multiplicative carbon track length correction.
Type: float

carbonOffsetCorr.description:
Additive carbon track length correction. [mm]
Type: float
